    • Method Detail

      • specialSkill

        public void specialSkill(Card target)
        Changes a target Card's current status. Select a random number between 0 to 99 If 49 or above, target is poisoned and cannot move for 1 turn Otherwise, target is paralyzed and cannot move for 2 turns
        Parameters:
        target - The target Card
